lead_paragraph: There were tiny ice crystals on the infield when batting practice began. New Yankees second baseman Starlin Castro wore a balaclava. Houston ace Dallas Keuchel said the baseballs felt chalky, "like throwing a sandball."

headline.print_headline: Correa's Dribbler Boosts Astros Over Yanks 5-3 in Opener
headline.main: Correa's Dribbler Boosts Astros Over Yanks 5-3 in Opener
